page.title: 07Village Activities -Adults
page.content: The{Womens Institute}and{Mothers} {Union}usually meet in the village hall.They are organised just for women and they go to factories, buildings and farms on visits, and have talks. { Body Building}and{Keep Fit}both take place in the village hall, as does {flower arranging}classes.{The Senior {Citizens Club}meets in the Old School Room. In The Eagles Pub, people can buy drinks and meals and they have mens and womens{darts}teams. In the Working Mens Club they have a {domino}team. They also run{bingo fortnightly. Cressage Church has a{choir,}in which about 15 adults sing. In our village questionaire we found that{knitting, gardening, walking}and {reading}are very popular with the adults.
